title: February 2026 School Club Round Up!
body: School Club Roundup (SCR) is from February 9th to 13th! There are two School Club Roundups during each school year in October and February. The contest is Monday through Friday from 1300 UTC Monday through 2359 UTC Friday

title: License Exams by FLARC
body: Saturday, February 7th is the semester's first FCC license exam run by The Four Lakes Amateur Radio Club. They are on the first Saturday of each month at Space Place, in the Villager Mall. Click to learn more.

title: Spring 2026 Meetings
body: Meetings for Spring 2026 are every Tuesday at 4PM in the Shack. Click the join button above to get on the roster. To get directions to the Shack in the Engineering Research Building click on this card!
